channel.title: Server and forum question
channel.description: WEll im a mod in my friends game and forums and my friend is having trouble with something. We watn to add highscores to our forums from ingame and put a client in our forums. We already have msqul or something like that its just that we cant find ay good guides. Can anyone help?
